rooms.description: Spacious Scandinavian-inspired living area with natural light and open-plan design. Features minimalist decor, soft tones, and functional furniture. Adheres to Vastu by facing east for positivity.
Adjacent to the living room, featuring a dining table set up in a space that encourages social interactions and good energy flow as per Vastu guidelines. Located next to the kitchen.
Functional kitchen with an L-shaped layout ensuring efficient movement, ample storage, and adherence to Vastu by placing it in the southeast section for prosperity.

Dedicated home office space on the ground floor, designed with Scandinavian minimalism, natural light, and ergonomic furniture. Placed near a window facing north or east to boost productivity while aligning with Vastu principles.
Clean, modern bathroom with Scandinavian aesthetics. Features minimalist design and fixtures; placed on the ground floor for convenience.

openings.description: Main entrance positioned in the north-east corner of the villa to invite positive energy as per Vastu principles.
A balcony adjoining the living room or office area, providing outdoor space with a view, designed with minimalist Scandinavian style and integrated safety features.
Multiple windows placed strategically to maximize natural light and ventilation while following Vastu guidelines of openings facing north and east.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with Scandinavian design, featuring a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. Placed in the southwest area for privacy and calm energy as per Vastu.
Second bedroom designed in Scandinavian style with ample storage and natural lighting, situated near central areas to balance family dynamics.

Dedicated home theater space with soundproofing and comfortable seating. Positioned away from bedrooms to minimize noise disruption, aligned with Vastu principles by placing entertainment zones in the southwest quadrant.

openings.description: Balconies adjacent to the bedrooms for fresh air and views, designed with Scandinavian minimalist elements.
Strategically placed windows in each room ensuring optimal light distribution and Vastu alignment by facing north and east where possible.
